code: import Swal from"sweetalert2";import withReactContent from"sweetalert2-react-content";export function show_alert(icono,mensaje){var foco=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:"";OnFocus(foco);var MySwal=withReactContent(Swal);MySwal.fire({title:mensaje,icon:icono});}function OnFocus(foco){if(foco!==""){document.getElementById("foco").focus();}}
